snippet.title: Adventures with Barbie: Ocean Discovery (CD-Rom, 1997) 100% Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Adventures with Barbie: Ocean Discovery CD-ROM is the first action adventure title for the PC starring Mattel's blonde-haired beauty. If you thought Barbie is only good at riding horses, doing make-up or fashion shows, think again! Barbie can do anything... including scuba diving.

Barbie takes the role of a marine biologist who swims her way through the ocean depths searching for clues and pieces of a treasure map. Accompanied by Sandy the Dolphin, the heroine explores the ocean, fixes coral reefs, collects objects, takes pictures for her printable scrapbook, and plays games that, when successfully completed, earn a charm for her bracelet.

While Barbie is exploring underwater, she uses her video watch to check in with her trusted friend Ken, who guards the boat and keeps her apprised of what's happening on the surface. Barbie must outsmart the devious Captain Barnacle, who claims the treasure belongs to him since it was lost a century earlier by his great-great-grandfather Captain Billows. Rather than keep the treasure, Barbie plans to donate any gold and gems she finds to the Marine Life League to save and protect the creatures of the sea.

100% Walkthrough video of the game. Time to save the sea!
Looking for ways to capture your game footage for your Youtube channel or live stream? Check out the following products below.

:: HDMI Game Capture ::
Elgato HDMI Game Capture Device [60 FPS] : https://amzn.to/2WMQym4
AverMedia HDMI Game Capture Device: https://amzn.to/2Gc2A3y
HDMI to USB3 Capture Card: https://www.gearbest.com/cables-connectors/pp_009971883549.html?wid=1433363&lkid=19620147

:: Analog Game Capture ::
Composite AV - USB Capture device: https://amzn.to/2DhCdFh

:: Animated Motion Backgrounds ::
Looking for high quality looping animated background videos to spice up your own videos? Check out my custom made HD motion background clips! You can get them here: https://www.videoblocks.com/portfolio/zijlstravideo
